title: Enhancing efficacy of combretastatin A4 by encapsulation in solid lipid nanoparticles: Implications for anti-angiogenic cancer therapy.
abstract: Nanotechnology-based drug delivery systems, such as solid lipid nanoparticles (SLNs), offer promising strategies to enhance the efficacy and stability of therapeutic agents. In this study, we explored the characterization, stability, and therapeutic efficacy of SLNs loaded with Combretastatin A4 (CA4) in cancer treatment.
